languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс издает сухой смешок.{/n} "Если бы я призвал демона или обрушил на головы окружающих огненный ливень, мы бы сейчас не стояли тут и не разговаривали. Тем не менее, {name}, я унес жизнь члена семьи — на мой взгляд, драмы более чем достаточно".

{n}Heinrix lets out a dry chuckle.{/n} "If I were to summon a daemon or rain down fire on everyone's heads, we wouldn't be standing here talking right now. However, {name}, I took the life of a family member — in my opinion, that is more than enough drama."
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс издает сухой смешок.{/n} "Если бы я призвал демона или обрушил на головы окружающих огненный ливень, мы бы сейчас не стояли тут и не разговаривали. Тем не менее, {name}, я унес жизнь члена семьи — на мой взгляд, драмы более чем достаточно".

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix lets out a dry chuckle.{/n} "If I were to summon a daemon or rain down fire on everyone's heads, we wouldn't be standing here talking right now. However, {name}, I took the life of a family member — in my opinion, that is more than enough drama."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix lets out a dry chuckle.{/n} "If I were to summon a daemon or rain down fire on everyone's heads, we wouldn't be standing here talking right now. However, {name}, I took the life of a family member — in my opinion, that is more than enough drama."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix lets out a dry chuckle.{/n} "If I were to summon a daemon or rain down fire on everyone's heads, we wouldn't be standing here talking right now. However, {name}, I took the life of a family member — in my opinion, that is more than enough drama."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}海因里希发出一阵干笑。{/n}“如果是那种真正曲折离奇的故事，比如我召唤出了一只恶魔，或是将烈焰砸在每个人的头上，那我恐怕就不会站在这里和你聊天了。不过，{name}，我夺走了一位家庭成员的性命。在我看来，这已经够曲折了。”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix lets out a dry chuckle.{/n} "If I were to summon a daemon or rain down fire on everyone's heads, we wouldn't be standing here talking right now. However, {name}, I took the life of a family member — in my opinion, that is more than enough drama."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希发出一阵干笑。{/n}“如果是那种真正曲折离奇的故事，比如我召唤出了一只恶魔，或是将烈焰砸在每个人的头上，那我恐怕就不会站在这里和你聊天了。不过，{name}，我夺走了一位家庭成员的性命。在我看来，这已经够曲折了。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix lets out a dry chuckle.{/n} "If I were to summon a daemon or rain down fire on everyone's heads, we wouldn't be standing here talking right now. However, , I took the life of a family member — in my opinion, that is more than enough drama."

languages.text: {n}Heinrix deja escapar una risa seca.{/n} «Si fuera a invocar a un daemon o desatar una lluvia de fuego sobre nuestras cabezas, no estaríamos aquí, hablando. No obstante, {name}, acabé con la vida de alguien de mi familia. En mi opinión, eso ya es bastante dramático».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix lets out a dry chuckle.{/n} "If I were to summon a daemon or rain down fire on everyone's heads, we wouldn't be standing here talking right now. However, {name}, I took the life of a family member — in my opinion, that is more than enough drama."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix deja escapar una risa seca.{/n} «Si fuera a invocar a un daemon o desatar una lluvia de fuego sobre nuestras cabezas, no estaríamos aquí, hablando. No obstante, {name}, acabé con la vida de alguien de mi familia. En mi opinión, eso ya es bastante dramático».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスは乾いた笑いを浮かべた。{/n}「もし私がディーモンを召喚したり、皆の頭に火の雨を降らせたりしていたら、私たちは今ここで立ち話をしていないだろう。しかし、{name}、私は確かに、家族の生命を奪ったことがあるのだ。私に言わせれば、それは十分過ぎるドラマだ」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix lets out a dry chuckle.{/n} "If I were to summon a daemon or rain down fire on everyone's heads, we wouldn't be standing here talking right now. However, {name}, I took the life of a family member — in my opinion, that is more than enough drama."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスは乾いた笑いを浮かべた。{/n}「もし私がディーモンを召喚したり、皆の頭に火の雨を降らせたりしていたら、私たちは今ここで立ち話をしていないだろう。しかし、{name}、私は確かに、家族の生命を奪ったことがあるのだ。私に言わせれば、それは十分過ぎるドラマだ」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix stößt ein trockenes Lachen aus.{/n} "Würde ich einen Dämonen beschwören oder Feuer auf aller Köpfe regnen lassen, würden wir hier nicht stehen und uns unterhalten. Aber {name}, ich habe einem Familienmitglied das Leben genommen. In meinen Augen ist das genug Drama."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix lets out a dry chuckle.{/n} "If I were to summon a daemon or rain down fire on everyone's heads, we wouldn't be standing here talking right now. However, {name}, I took the life of a family member — in my opinion, that is more than enough drama."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix stößt ein trockenes Lachen aus.{/n} "Würde ich einen Dämonen beschwören oder Feuer auf aller Köpfe regnen lassen, würden wir hier nicht stehen und uns unterhalten. Aber {name}, ich habe einem Familienmitglied das Leben genommen. In meinen Augen ist das genug Drama."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix pousse un petit rire cassant.{/n} « Si j'avais invoqué un démon ou provoqué un déluge de feu, nous ne serions pas en train d'en discuter. J'ai tout de même tué un membre de ma famille, {name}. À mon sens, c'est déjà bien assez dramatique en soi. »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix lets out a dry chuckle.{/n} "If I were to summon a daemon or rain down fire on everyone's heads, we wouldn't be standing here talking right now. However, {name}, I took the life of a family member — in my opinion, that is more than enough drama."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix pousse un petit rire cassant.{/n} « Si j'avais invoqué un démon ou provoqué un déluge de feu, nous ne serions pas en train d'en discuter. J'ai tout de même tué un membre de ma famille, {name}. À mon sens, c'est déjà bien assez dramatique en soi. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix, duygusuzca kıkırdıyor.{/n} "Öyle iblis falan çağırmış olsam, milletin başına ateşler yağdırsam şimdi bunları konuşuyor olamazdık. Lakin {name}... Gittim, kendi kanımdan birinin canını aldım. Bana sorarsan bu, ziyadesiyle acıklı bir hikâye."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix lets out a dry chuckle.{/n} "If I were to summon a daemon or rain down fire on everyone's heads, we wouldn't be standing here talking right now. However, {name}, I took the life of a family member — in my opinion, that is more than enough drama."

traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
